column4: How do I turn off the keystroke for going into a "command mode" in Unity?
The thing is, I hit a certain key to toggle between English and Korean input normally.   But in Unity if I hit that key, it will go into the dash saying "Type your command"   Pretty annoying.
I guess the easiest fix will be to install a sane windows manager like gnome
pratz does any of that help, or am I totally python illiterate?
